comments.body:
This bit is actually unnecessary, because it's crawling under `./lib/`, not directly in `.`.  I didn't notice that when I was preparing my patch.

In fact, changing `.` to `lib` in the other compileall invocations would perhaps be a better way of fixing this problem.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +27,31 @@commands =
    python --version
    python -m compileall -fq -x 'lib/ansible/module_utils|.tox' lib
    make tests
deps = -r{toxinidir}/test-requirements.txt
